sentences.english: The previously known most distant object was a short-lived gamma ray burst.

sentences.english: Think short term and long term.

sentences.english: The so-called "green barriers" cannot be completely eliminated in a short term.

sentences.english: So there is the short-term issue of how to tighten policy safely.

sentences.english: In other words, long-dated bonds offer a lot more income than short ones.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，長期債券的收益要高於短期債券。

sentences.english: In the short-run, there are definitely some headwinds.

sentences.english: Therefore, the accurate assessment of the credit risk of STCP is on imminent.

sentences.english: A business overdraft would be most suitable for short-term loans.
sentences.chinese: 商業透支項目最適合短期貸款。

sentences.english: Some of the effects of short-term sleep deprivation can be very similar to the effects of being drunk.
sentences.chinese: 短期睡眠剝奪的某些影響與醉酒的後果類似。

sentences.english: Set specific short- and long-term goals.
sentences.chinese: 制定詳細的短期和長期目標。
